content: fold the hemispheres so that the points where the end of the last round coincide on both pieces connect the hemispheres with black yarn using a tapestry needle engaging the front loops of the near detail and the back loops of the far detail stu cid 470 the toy and finish connecting the hemispheres use the black button to cover the uneven transition of rounds on the sphere sew on the black button with black yarn sew over the edge ssew a white button with white yarn over the black button sew on over the edge when you sew on the white button pull it to the sphere sew a few stitches across the center of the magic ring single_crochet in the first round you are now finished please share your creations with me you can use tag me on instagram @keti crochet i m waiting for you on my youtube channel there are many free crochet patterns on my channel https //www youtube com/channel/uckpdgp250hi0w2xbhycz1zw
